description.value: Defines the additional constraints and extensions on the UK Core Observation profile, for recording tobacco consumption.

purpose.value: To provide implementers with additional support when implementing gathering and recording the patient's tobacco consumption per day / week. This profile should not be used to record the vaping habits of a patient.
